features: 🎮【Massive game library】Retro game console external hard drive 500G has 60,000+ games,70+ classic emulators, compatible with arcades, major mainstream games, and other fun retro games, use the game hard drive to enhance your gaming experience, 500G hard drive helps you easily organize and play your favorite games! (Please contact us for a list of games)

🖥️【Plug and Play Video Games】Bearway 500GB game console hard drive emulator console is plug and play, no driver required, just one wire link, your computer will become a game console in no time (for Windows 8.1 and above). You can enjoy happy retro gaming time with your friends and family anytime.

⚡【Fast transmission speed】 The 2.5-inch SATA hard disk adopts USB 3.0 interface, with a transmission speed of up to 5Gbps, which means that you only need to wait a few seconds when transferring large files or videos. It's made of ABS material, which is durable and has excellent heat dissipation. With an indicator light, it is always on when it is on standby, and it flashes when it is reading. The 500G portable hard disk provides you with a smoother and more stable gaming experience.

😀【Portable mobile hard disk】 This super console 500G hard disk is only 5''*3.1''*0.5'', 0.3lb, the size of a mobile phone,whether it is for business or travel, just put it in your pocket or backpack, and easily connect with a laptop or desktop computer, you can easily start a retro game journey, or store it anytime, anywhere, this hard drive game console can accompany you anywhere

🎄🎁【Gift for Him】Give this retro gaming hard drive as a Christmas gift to your husband, friends and family to enjoy the fun of retro gaming together. We provide 24/7 customer service, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rugged Hard Drive Adopts ABS material casing, no fear of dropping, better protect the hard drive Smart Sleep 10 minutes of no operation automatic fast sleep, effectively extend the life of the hard disk Indicator Light 500G HDD Blue indicator light, standby is always on, blinking when reading, working status at a glance Portable Size Portable hard disk, which can be used on the go, only the size of a mobile phone (optional version with controller)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Golden One
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what it is designed to do and thus far, I have had no issues nor and discrepancies with this device. Definitely packed with games [a few dups due to cross-plats and regions, but not projected towards deceptively beefing up the numbers, so this particular console/device is an honest one from a trustworthy company (Kenhank)]. Plan to purchase again for my mother (who has a nostalgic love for titles spaning Atari-SNES consoles). Comes equipped with a Controller which performs extremely well [unless you prefer using the D-Pad instead of the Analogs while playing titles that may require a diagonal action/commands (fighting games such as Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat, Tekken etc.)] so another controller equipped with an 8 Directional Pad would be superb (so the $49.99 would be the ideal choice especially for those who are in possession of PC controllers with the afore mentioned function). Controller aside, the device itself is a solid performing hard drive console for the PC/Gaming Laptop. Good Freaking Job Kenhank💪🏾👍🏾.
